description:
Sarah blake is back for a second crack at the FuckingMachines. She does a bed scene with the DragonHead on the Universal Positioning Device (UPD), before moving on to a beautiful standing position in the Chain Room with the Crystal Palace. We finish off with two spread eagle positions on the CycloRack -- one with the Fucksall, and next with the Dragon. Don't miss the out-of-control trembling orgasms in this set! And Sarah is so sweet; she has a smile to die for :)
Also, I tried the new internal Gynocam, but alas, the transmitter was too flaky. But don't worry; it will be back!
Enjoy, G-Force
title: Sarah Blake
